titleStmt.title: [Thystorye and lyf of the noble and crysten prynce Charles the grete kynge of Frauuce [sic]]
titleStmt.author: Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.

publicationStmt.publisher: And the yere of our lord M CCCC lxxxv, and enprynted the fyrst day of decembre the same yere of our lord .. Explicit p[er] William Caxton,

notesStmt.note: Translated by William Caxton from the French.
Imperfect; lacks leaves a1, d1, h1 and m8.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
